mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.code as t_code, t.type as t_type, t.year as t_year, t.start_time as t_start_time, t.end_time as t_end_time, t.area as t_area, t.grade as t_grade, t.duration as t_duration, t.discounts as t_discounts
mapper.insert: insert into movie (id, name, code, type, year, start_time, end_time, area, grade, duration, discounts) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{duration,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into movie
id,
name,
code,
type,
year,
start_time,
end_time,
area,
grade,
duration,
discounts,

mapper.update:
update movie
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{year,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discounts = #{discounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update movie set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discounts = #{discounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
